summary: Conscientious and enthusiastic student dedicated to every project with a passion for AI and software engineering
Strong background combining software engineering, data, and business strategy with hands-on experience in enterprise AI chatbots
Excellent team player with empathy and strong communication skills, committed to continuous learning and growth

experience.title: AI Chatbot Developer
bullets: Development of enterprise AI chatbots for querying and managing large-scale datasets
Implementation of RAG architectures using LlamaIndex, pgvector, and LangGraph
Integration with internal systems and optimization of semantic search and response quality

experience.title: University Collaborator - Mathematics Teacher Assistant
bullets: Mathematics teacher and teaching assistant for algebra, calculus and mathematical fundamentals
Supporting students in the Artificial Intelligence degree program
Mentoring and guiding students through complex mathematical concepts

education.description: Strong academic focus combining software engineering, data, and business strategy. High workload and rigorous program requiring strong discipline, adaptability, and continuous learning.

extracurricular.name: Mad for Supercomputing
extracurricular.organization: Barcelona Supercomputing Center & Fundació Catalunya La Pedrera
extracurricular.description: Mad for supercomputing course for baccalaureate students interested in STEM, organized by the Barcelona Supercomputing Center and Fundació Catalunya La Pedrera. In this course I learned about the basics of supercomputing how do they work and how to use them.

extracurricular.name: Can Computers Do Math - UAB
extracurricular.description: Summer program that connects talented students with top researchers. Includes research, workshops, and science communication training, fostering critical thinking and innovation

extracurricular.description: Classical piano training since age 5, developing discipline, creativity, and performance skills through years of dedicated practice and study
